title: PAx Aus Skins?????
body: Emailed Pax2015@riotgames.com about the Pax skins since Riot didnt goto Pax Aus this year sent me ticket numbers i had 4 tickets still havnt heard back. Whats going on

replies.body:
Hey Fishin Turbo,

How long ago did you submit your request? I'm sure that the Riot team is hard at work trying to get skins to everyone who attended PAX. If there aren't any updates to your ticket in 7 days, feel free to reach out to me and I'll see if I can check up on the status of those tickets.

Thanks for your support!
I'll be able to check up again after the New Years; sorry for the inconvenience!

Hi i got an Email from them on the 26/10/15

"Hi

Thanks for your email with regards to the PAX bonus content.

We will process and validate your ticket and if validated send your bonus content in October in conjunction with the start of PAX.

Thanks
RIOT OCE"
Did you get anything? I'm STILL waiting.

I'm in the same boat, I emailed on Sep 6, Nov 19 and today 8 Dec.
I only ever got a reply on Sep 6 saying the same thing that Fishin Turbo got.
I'm pretty sure Riot is NOT hard at work trying to get skins for the PAX attendees who bough their tix early.
